target.code:
def calculate_area_of_triangle(base, height):
    return (1 / 2) * base * height
target.description: Calculate the area of a triangle given its base and height.
target.name: calculate_area_of_triangle

target.description: Calculate the area of a circle given its radius.
target.name: calculate_area_of_circle

target.code:
from sympy import Matrix

def calculate_area_of_triangle_from_vertices(vertex_a, vertex_b, vertex_c):
    A = Matrix([vertex_a, vertex_b, vertex_c])
    return abs(A.det()) / 2
target.description: Calculate the area of a triangle given its vertices using the determinant formula.
target.name: calculate_area_of_triangle_from_vertices
